name: 郝名媛
objective: 以整合行銷傳播為基礎，分析產品之廣告與推廣組合機會，進而發展全傳播之策略與企劃，意圖培養學生邏輯思考、資料判讀、廣告企劃分析之能力，亦包括各種產業之企劃工作。
schedule:
1.課程介紹(Orientation/Course brief)
2.案例討論/廣告管理(Case Study/Advertising Management)
3.廣告概說(Introduction Advertising)
4.廣告組織與經營(The organization in Advertising)
5.廣告媒體(Advertising and media)
6.其他廣告媒體之介紹(Using other media)
7.廣告與消費行為(Marketing and Consumer Behavior)
8.廣告策略與規劃(Creative Strategy and Creative Process)
9.廣告創意與表現/CF(Producing ads for media)
10.廣告效果測定與評估(Motoring, Evaluation and Control)
11.促銷及促銷方法(Sales Promotion)
12.公共關係策略(Public Relations)
13.期末報告(Case study & Final Presentation)
14.期末報告(Case study & Final Presentation)
15.期末報告(Case study & Final Presentation)
16.期末報告(Case study & Final Presentation)
17.期末考(Final Examination)
scorePolicy:
*Prompt and regular attendance 20%
*Active and intelligent participation in class discussion 10%
*Personal homework 10%
*Personal Final project 40%
*Final examination 20%
